product.shortDescription:
CUSTOMIZED HANDLE BOXES

Handle boxes serve numerous purposes. The handle on top of these boxes makes them easy to carry. These boxes can be customized in all shapes and sizes according to your specification. You can have your handle boxes printed in different sizes, shapes, colors, and designs.

Handle boxes are used for packaging and presenting a variety of goods.
